features: 14-piece knife set with 11 knives, a pair of kitchen scissors/shears, a knife sharpener, and a pine storage block
Knives include (1) 8-inch chef's knife, (1) 8-inch slicing knife, (1) 8-inch bread knife, (1) 5.5-inch utility knife, (1) 3.5-inch peeling/paring knife, and (6) 4.5-inch steak knives
High carbon stainless-steel blades for precision results and lasting sharpness
Traditional, full tang, triple-riveted ergonomic knife handles offer pleasant weight for better balance and control

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordability Meets Quality: A Stellar Knife Set!
reviews.reviewText: I invested in the Amazon Basics Stainless Steel Comfort Grip Knife Set, and my kitchen experience has been nothing short of wonderful. This 18-piece set is a complete arsenal for all your culinary adventures. With each knife designed for a specific task, it's like having a professional kitchen right on your countertop.The first thing that caught my eye was the sleek design and the comfort grip handles. These knives not only look gorgeous on my kitchen counter, but the grip is so ergonomic that chopping has become a less tedious task. The brushed stainless steel handles offer a secure and comfortable grip, making the knives easy to control even during demanding tasks.The high carbon stainless steel blades are the stars of the show. They are stain, rust, and pit resistant, which is a testament to their durability. With a satin finish, they glide through ingredients with ease. The variety of knives in this set is impressive, catering to all kinds of food prep tasks like chopping, cutting, slicing, peeling, and much more.Now, while the knives are sharp and ready to use out of the box, I did notice that they might need frequent sharpening with heavy use. The good news is that the set includes a sharpening steel, so keeping the blades sharp and ready is not a chore.The rubber wood block that houses the knives is compact and stylish, fitting well in any kitchen setting. The set includes a chef's knife, bread knife, ham knife, santoku knife, utility knife, vegetable knife, paring knife, sharpening steel, and eight steak knives, all neatly organized in a rubber wood block.The affordability of this set is a cherry on top. It's a budget-friendly option without compromising on quality or functionality. The Amazon Basics Stainless Steel Comfort Grip Knife Set is indeed a valuable addition to any kitchen. The quality, the range of knives, and the price point make it a commendable choice. I highly recommend this set to anyone looking to upgrade their kitchen game without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My old knives were a popular brand and very expensive. They did not hold up after 5 years of home kitchen use. They literally fell apart…so…I began a search for a sharp, durable knife set that didn’t break my budget. The reviews on these knives seemed positive and the price was right so I decided to purchase them, not expecting anything great.Well, these are seriously the best knives I’ve ever bought! They are seriously sharp! So sharp that you need to be VERY careful with them so you don’t cut yourself. I sliced a whole watermelon in under a minute with one very arthritic hand. They’re THAT sharp!These knives are one solid piece so you know they will not fall apart at the handle. They’re also very lightweight.If you’re looking for sharp knives that actually cut, that will not fall apart or break your budget, these will be your new best friend in the kitchen. The knife holder is sturdy and attractive and the scissors are of good quality as well. It comes with a sharpener that fits into the knife holder so that is real handy as well, although I don’t see myself needing to sharpen these for quite some time.I am super impressed and happy with this purchase and I highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice knife set! Had it one month, will update in the future. ULTRA sharp, be careful! The blade steel thickness is not a thick as the Henckel but its still pretty sturdy and does not flex on the chef 8" knife. The steel seems to get a brushed finish fairly easily when I use my ScotchBrite pad to clean them and I thus believe the steel is softer and will require sharpening more often. I believe they use a shallow angle on the factory edge, so although ULTRA sharp now, I expect it to be more average on resharpening unless I can replicate the shallow angle well. It's a very complete set and the wood block is nice quality, size, etc. It's a great set of knives for the money! It would make a nice gift for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super sharp and efficient knives
reviews.reviewText: This item is way worth its price.I can compare it to more expensive henckels, and these blades proved to be a lot sharper and useful.The blades are generally thin. So I am assuming their life may not be for 10 years. But if you are looking for a medium time span of 5 years or so, I dont think anything comes close to this if you put price in consideration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Set of Knives
reviews.reviewText: At this price I did not expect them to be so nice. Sturdy and super sharp. The wood block is great quality and they take up less room than my old set from the 90’s. If you are looking for a nice assortment of knives that do everything and don’t feel like spending $200, you cannot go wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I am not a professional, cook or anything and I’ve always had cheap knives. This is a very good cheap knife set. I don’t mean that as a disrespect to them, they cut great, but I have used a professional set of knives in the past that we’re not mine and there’s no comparison, however for just anyone’s kitchen these are awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: In my kitchen! Convenience and good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not that sharp
reviews.reviewText: These knives are not as sharp as I thought. When I first got this, I tested it out on a honey dew. I used the biggest knife it came with. It cut like butter at first. As I kept cutting, I noticed it got more dull. Even with the knife sharpener that comes with it. I've only had this a couple of weeks so no way it should be this dull. I still feel like I'm sawing to cut basic stuff, and I have had to resort to my old knife. The only reason I gave it three stars is because the kitchen scissors work really well. Also, the smaller knives seem to cut better than the bigger ones. I onions and cucumbers with the smaller ones and I got a better result than with the bigger one. I would not recommend this product.
súper calidad, el precio es excelente
Son ligeros y fáciles de usar, el filo es muy bueno; veremos qué tanto se mantienen filosos sin necesidad de reafilarlos. Se limpian facilmente y la relación calidad-precio es muy favorable.
Impressed with the quality for the price. Very sharp! Cuts well.
I love these knives! The block is nice, the craftsmanship really shines, and was sooooo happy with how affordable they were. Just be careful cause they’re hella sharp!

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buen producto! Cumple perfectamente la función.
reviews.reviewText: - Entrega: En tiempo, Amazon Prime (No hay falla).- Empaque y embalaje:*Empaque... Excelente, sobre todo teniendo en consideración el tipo de producto. Empaque bien sellado. *Embalaje... El embalaje de uno de los cuchillos venia suelto (está en las fotos), sin embargo, no afectó en lo absoluto, supongo que es normal debido al movimiento que puede tener el producto dentro del empaque.- Producto: Buenísimo por el precio y muy buen diseño! Tienen muchísimo filo (tengan cuidado al lavarlos).* Material... Excelente calidad.* Peso... Muy buen peso. No son ligeros ni pesados en exceso... Se sienten de buena calidad y el peso ayuda a la buena manipulación.* Agarre: Bueno y cómodo.* Base: Funcional y de buena calidad.- CONCLUSIÓN: Muy buen producto por el precio (los compre durante Prime Day con muy buen descuento). Sin duda lo volvería a comprar incluso a precio regular.
